meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> hits, it's <radical>rain</radical>ing, and you're outside trying to use a <radical>rake</radical>, you're going to be very <kanji>wet</kanji> and <kanji>damp</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You can't stand how <kanji>wet</kanji> and <kanji>damp</kanji> you feel in these clothes so you rip them off and rake in the <reading>nu</reading>de (ぬ)!
